msbt.message: Ah, you must be here to pick up the festive wreath I was going to give you before, right?
Whew! I'm so glad you came back for it. I did make it all special for you, after all.Trust me. Your place'll be the talk of with a signature wreath hanging!
Oh, but you STILL don't have room! I'm getting a weird vibe like you might not actually want this wreathIf you DO want it, make some room and come back, OK?
